issue.title: [C++][Dataset] Simplify Partitioning interface
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9068](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9068). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The `int segment` of `Partitioning::Parse` should not be exposed to the user. KeyValuePartiioning should be a private Impl interface, not in public headers. 

The same apply to `Partitioning::Format`.
